journey.name: Smart Paste from Clipboard
journey.description: Verify that pasting multi-line text from the clipboard splits it into multiple items.

actions.action: Click on the list called "For testing"
Long press the body text to select all content within.
Tap "Copy" in the context menu to place the text into the system clipboard.
Long press the "List item" input field to reveal the context menu.
Paste the content from the clipboard
Verify that the app automatically splits the text into three separate list items: "Carrots", "Potatoes", and "Onions"
Verify that there is NOT a single item containing all three words on separate lines
